dmca.title: Copyright / Trademark Infringement Notice - DMCA takedown immediately (BCA) -- 1st no
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Legal Affairs [mailto:legal_affairs@loanalliance.com] 
Sent: Friday, June 01, 2007 10:38 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: FW: RE: Copyright / Trademark Infringement Notice - DMCA takedown
immediately (BCA) -- 1st notice
Importance: High

 

 

                                                                                                                               June
1,
2007

SENT VIA EMAIL AND REGISTED MAIL

 

 

RE: Copyright / Trademark Infringement Notice - DMCA takedown immediately


Registrant: 


Domain: holdmortgage.com/bad-credit.htm
  Domains by Proxy, Inc. 
  DomainsByProxy.com 
  15111 N. Hayden Rd., Ste 160, PMB 353 
  Scottsdale, Arizona 85260 
  United States 


Name Servers: 
 NS1.HOSTSHAPE.COM 
 NS2.HOSTSHAPE.COM

Server Data

IP Address:

67.18.15.34

IP Location:

- Texas - Dallas - Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc

 

 

 

Dear The Planet.com,

Loan Alliance Inc. has recently discovered that the operator(s) of
http://www.holdmortgage.com/bad-credit.htm (the "Website") IS ONCE AGAIN blatantly
violating our web property www.badcreditalliance.com intellectual property rights.
Loan Alliance Inc. provides this notification of infringement pursuant to the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act (the "DMCA"). The Website violates
www.badcreditalliance.com <http://www.imortgagecentral.com/>  rights in several
different ways:

1) Your clients copying and distribution of the content highlighted in the attached
screen shot of the infringing material at http://www.holdmortgage.com/bad-credit.htm
, or any part of the Website, is copyright infringement against our web property
badcreditalliance.com under United States Copyright law.  As we are sure you are
aware, Federal law, specifically Section 106 of the Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
